task.title: Best Ever Breakfast Potatoes
task.shortdesc: These hearty and home style baked breakfast potatoes are so easy and will become a go-to recipe.

taskbody.prereq:
Materials for this recipe include a large mixing bowl, a measuring cup, and a baking sheet. Ingredients are as follows:
5 pounds red potatoes, roughly chopped
4 cloves garlic, minced
1 onion, chopped
1 green bell pepper, seeded and roughly chopped
1 red bell pepper, seeded and roughly chopped
1/4 cup olive oil
1/2 stick butter melted
1/2 stick Earth Balance Vegan Buttery Stick
1 tsp seasoned salt
1/2 tsp cayenne pepper
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
5 slices of cooked bacon, crumbled (optional)

step.cmd: In a large bowl, toss together the potatoes, garlic, onion, green bell pepper, red bell pepper, olive oil, , seasoned salt, cayenne pepper and some kosher salt and pepper.
Bake for 20-25 minutes, shaking the pan twice
Raise the heat to 500 degrees and bake until crisp and brown, 10 to 15 minutes
Sprinkle with a little more salt and pepper and crumbled bacon bits (optional) before serving.
Sprinkle with a little more salt and pepper before serving.

taskbody.result: You will have a filling breakfast side dish that can be enjoyed by a big Sunday brunch crowd or saved for more breakfasts in the future.Best Ever Breakfast Potatoes
taskbody.postreq: Store the leftover potatoes in an airtight container in the fridge. Let other people know they're in there so they don't go to waste!
